title: SHRIMP & COUSCOUS PAELLA
directions: Coat a large pot (8 to 10 quart) with olive oil and set on medium heat. Add the peppers, garlic and onion and let the veggies cook until tender. Next, add the salt, pepper, thyme, cumin, saffron and red pepper flakes to the pot, letting the spices simmer for 1 minute. Then add the chicken stock, water, peas and shrimp to the pot. Cover with a lid and let simmer for 2 minutes.
Remove the pot from heat and add the couscous stirring slowly. Cover the pot again and let the stew sit for 5 minutes, or until the couscous is cooked down.
ingredients: 1 lb	Medium Shrimp, shelled, washed and deveined
1	Red Pepper, cut into thin strips
